mapper.select: select a.*, d.nick_name as createdName, e.nick_name as updatedName from carousels a LEFT JOIN wechat_user d ON a.created_by = d.id LEFT JOIN wechat_user e ON a.updated_by = e.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.*, d.nick_name as createdName, e.nick_name as updatedName from carousels a LEFT JOIN wechat_user d ON a.created_by = d.id LEFT JOIN wechat_user e ON a.updated_by = e.id where 1=1
order by a.order_num desc,a.created_date desc
